descriptionSet.description: A overview of all the cast and crew of the movie "Duniya Ka Mela" released in 1974.

inscription.text: Pearl Pictures present "Duniya Ka Mela" (Eastmancolor) Starring: Sanjay - Rekha - Rehman - Jeevan - Purnima and Mehmood with Bindu & Ranjeet Also: Sunder - Jagdish Raj - Brahamchari - Yash Raj - Shetty - Kirti Kumar - Rohit Hari Shukla - Rajan Kapoor - Bhagwan Sinha - Narbada Shanker - Dinanath Vijay Kapoor - Master Raju - Baby Xhanu Special Appearance: Ajit - Asrani - Mukri Produced by G.M. Roshan Directed by Kundan Kumar Music Laxmikant Pyarelal Lyrics Anand Bakshi Screenplay Dhruv Chatterji & Vishwanath Pandey Legal & Finance Adviser H.D. Pathak Junior Artistes Supplied by M.H. Malick Dialogue Ehsan Razvi Hair Styles Geeta, Erline Comedy Dialogue Rafi Ajmeri Poster Designs Exper Eyes, Pamart Director of Photoghraphy Shyam Rao Posters printed at Oriental Litho Works Operative Cameraman D.P. Shinde Set Decoration Alimohamed Premji, Nensej Furniture Editor Kamalakar Art GaneshBasak & Aga Jani Wardrobe Bhanu Athiya, New Stylo, Stylo, Mani Rabadi, Maganial Dresswala, Madanlal Dresswala Make-up Artiste B. Pereira & Farzand Ali Choreography Kamal, Naidu & Sohanlal Sound Recordist Pandurang Boloor Produced at Film Center Associate Ramanlal Production Executive Kanti Kanakla Production Controllers Sukhdev & Salim Colour Consultant L. Rodrigues Chief Assistant Director Ratilal Takar Sound Processing Famous Cine Lab. & Studios Ltd., Ramnord Research Laboratories Costumes Incharge Noor, Rajaram Still Publicity Bachubhai Shah (Expert Eyes) Outdoor Equipment Kalpana Kirti Cince Service, Deluxe Sound Service Public Relations Harish Mehra Processing Supervisor Ramsingh Playback Lata Mangeshkar, Asha Bhosle, Mohd, Rafi Radio Publicity Amin Sayani Fight Composed by Shetty Gramaphone H.M.V. Special Effects-Titles Dayabhai Recorded on R.C.A. Sound System Office Manager Madan Kapoor Blocks Nensey Blocks Booklets Asha Printery Financiers & Negative Holders Satellite Film Distributors, Bombay Assistants Direction S.N. Tripathi L.Harish Kumar Make-up Vithal Song Recording Salim, Keki, S.G.Dattar Photography Ganpat Rao, Doctor Sound Recording G. Prasad, Shaikh Abdul Music Shashikant, Gorakh Fights K. Irani Editing Babubhai Shah Production Dilwar, Harish Art Dattu, Rangachari Office Attendant Kamat
